questions.text: Dough jug sawbuck buy yips cougar
questions.correct: Don't judge a book by its cover & Dont judge a book by its cover
questions.explanation:
Don't judge a book by its cover & Dont judge a book by its cover.

	Meaning: Don't jump to conclusions about people based upon their looks. By the way, "sawbuck" is old-timey slang for dollar bill. Apparently dollars used to have big Roman numeral tens (Xes) on the back, and this reminded people of sawhorses (aka sawbucks), which have X-shaped legs.
